TopicTitle: How do I start a new game?

Articles.Content:
I understand KSP automatically saves your game progress, How would you go about starting a new game? I have tons of failed missions and rockets floating around but this is not my main reason for wanting to restart the game. A mod which has lost a sub menu (mechjeb) is hidden around the border of the game screen as i moved it out of the way during in a mission and cant find it again!

Any help?

Thanks, Bounty

I don\'t know about the mod, but to get rid of the debris all you need to do is delete your persistence file. That would be in KSP > KSP > KSP_win > saves > default > persistent

Welcome to the forums

Happy flying!

Arrrr!

Resident Capt\'n Skunky Impersonator.

A mod which has lost a sub menu (mechjeb) is hidden around the border of the game screen as i moved it out of the way during in a mission and cant find it again!

Delete MechJeb.cfg in \KSP_win\PluginData\mumechlib\
